body_html: @TimZaman Unless something has changed in the recent months, some of the cuDNN code is non-deterministic, for instance cudnn.SpatialConvolution. So, I guess that some of the CNN-related stuff in tensorflow may be non-reproducible (if run on GPU). Would probably be a bit of work, but it would be nice to have a flag or note in the TF docstrings of the affected functions.
